LanguageData.CM_Meeseeks_Box_SettingAutoSelectOnCreat: If set, the Meeseeks will automatically be selected upon creation by a player-controlled, non-Meeseeks pawn.
LanguageData.CM_Meeseeks_Box_SettingJumpCameraOnCreat: If set, the camera will jump to the location of the Meeseeks upon creation by a player-controlled, non-Meeseeks pawn.
LanguageData.CM_Meeseeks_Box_SettingAutoPauseOnCreati: If set, the game will pause when a Meeseeks is created by a player-controlled, non-Meeseeks pawn.
LanguageData.CM_Meeseeks_Box_SettingMeeseeksSpeaksDes: If set, voice clips will be played for a Meeseeks for certain events.
LanguageData.CM_Meeseeks_Box_SelectJobAreaDescription: Select additional targets for the Meeseeks' given job.
